articles.author: Elizabeth Misson, Cleveland Clinic News Service
articles.title: Seek care for heart emergencies during COVID-19 - WJXT News4JAX
articles.description: According to a recent study, since the COVID-19 crisis emerged, emergency rooms across the country are actually seeing fewer patients.
articles.content:
According to a recent study, since the COVID-19 crisis emerged, emergency rooms across the country are actually seeing fewer patients.
Experts believe people are delaying care for emergency health issues due to fears of coming in contact with the coronavirus… [+2022 chars]
